questions: How to use Mailchimp MA with ThamesThrive?
What is the extension needed to use Mailchimp MA with ThamesThrive?
How to install the extension to use Mailchimp MA with ThamesThrive?
answer:
# Can ThamesThrive use Mailchimp MA, a marketing automation platform and email marketing service?
Yes. To use Mailchimp MA, install the extension Mailchimp MA in Resource/Extensions.
